quotes: 2020, Alibaba donated RMB 3 billion to help fight the COVID-19 epidemic in China, and the Jack Ma Foundation, in partnership with the Alibaba Foundation, have donated RMB 200 million in epidemic prevention equipment such as test kits and face masks. Forbes named Jack Ma China’s most charitable entrepreneur in 2020.
